channel.title: Imbalanced-Data on Sherif Ahmed
channel.description: Recent content in Imbalanced-Data on Sherif Ahmed

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: Credit card fraud detection project using a highly unbalanced Kaggle dataset of 284,807 transactions with only 492 frauds. To address the imbalance the project implements a voting classifier and a neural network with focal loss in PyTorch achieving an F1 score of 86% and a PR AUC of 85%
